pros:
- Great work environment with structure and organization 
- Excellent team members with much respect and rapport, being there for each other 
- Great executive management team that support employees 
- respect for all employees with its diversity, inclusion, equity and belonging initiatives
- enthusiastic Business Leadership Team displaying an array of skills
cons:
•	Email overload - one needs to have exceptional organizational skills to keep on top of the situation in this dynamic organization (never a dull moment)
•	Many meetings but always productive and moving forward
